title: BlockHunt躲猫猫为什么只有OP可以玩啊求救啊！！
author: as82677729
txt_content:
本帖最后由 as82677729 于 2013-12-28 22:00 编辑 

求救啊，需要详细的修改方式

replies.author: as82677729
replies.txt_content: 还有就是几个OP一起进了以后也是不能玩啊啊

replies.author: Sansi丶XL
replies.txt_content:
输入 /mangaddp default blockhunt.player 
就可以了！

replies.author: ojiron
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp default blockhunt.player
/mangaddp default disguisecraft.object.block.*
这两个指令输入就好。
